column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: On 15 March 2019 at 8.30 pm
column4: a ladyboy threw acid on man
column5: causing him facial and chest injuries on Street 304
column8: Phnom Penh.------The suspects was sent to the Chamkarmon Police Inspectorate to proceed with legal action.------The acid attack came after the transgender suspect phoned the victim to ask for money
column10: making the suspect angry.------The suspect is Lach Sopho------
